title: Newspaper headlines: 'Fresh pressure on Venezuela' and a 'Brexit betrayal'
description: New warnings from the US to Venezuela lead most of Monday's papers, while some splash on Sir Keir's comments on closer EU alignment.
content: The US President ramping up "pressure on Venezuela" leads the Financial Times today after the White House warned of further armed force in Caracas if "a series of conditions laid out" by Marco Rubio is not met by Venezuela's Vice President Delcy Rodr... [2957 chars]

title: Charlotte Niddam: Teen girl educated in UK died in Swiss bar fire
description: The family of Charlotte Niddam announced her death "with great sadness" as Swiss authorities confirmed all victims had been identified.
content:
A former pupil at two British schools has been confirmed as one of the victims killed in a fire at a Swiss ski resort.

title: Chickenpox vaccine: 'My parents didn't know if I was going to live'
description: A teenager who had to learn to walk again after contracting chickenpox aged two welcomes new free vaccinations.
content:
A teenager who had to learn how to walk again after contracting chickenpox when she was two has welcomed new free vaccinations against the illness.
Children in Northern Ireland are being offered the service for the first time., external

title: South Korea's Lee Jae Myung to meet China's Xi
description: Trade, regional security and Beijing's unofficial ban on Korean pop culture are on the agenda.
content:
South Korea's President Lee Jae Myung is set to meet Chinese leader Xi Jinping as he seeks to reset frayed ties with his country's biggest trading partner.

title: Why some people really struggle to lose weight more than others
description: Thousands of genes that have an influence on weight, say experts - which means weight loss isn't a level playing field
content:
"Fat people just need more self-control." "It's about personal responsibility." "It's simple, just eat less."
These were some of the 1,946 comments, posted by readers, beneath an article I wrote last year about weight-loss injections.
